mapper.select: select exam_assignment.* from exam_assignment,exam_room,exam_location where exam_location.district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and exam_location.location_code = exam_room.location_code and exam_room.examroom_id = exam_assignment.examroom_id and exam_assignment.kaoci_id = #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_assignment (examroom_id, kaoci_id, exam_seq) values (#{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{examSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into exam_assignment
assignment_id,
examroom_id,
kaoci_id,
exam_seq,
#{assignmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{examSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update exam_assignment
examroom_id = #{examroomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
kaoci_id = #{kaociId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exam_seq = #{examSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where assignment_id = #{assignmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
